hero.title: Building the Future of Education in Egypt
hero.description: A team of passionate young Egyptians making education accessible and free for everyone

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe that education is a fundamental right for every Egyptian student. We work to break down the financial and geographical barriers that prevent students from receiving high-quality education.

free.title: 100% Free Education
free.description: No hidden fees, no subscriptions, truly free education

accessible.title: Available to Everyone
accessible.description: From Aswan to Alexandria, education is available to every student

interactive.title: Interactive Education
interactive.description: Live and interactive lessons with the best teachers

beginning.title: The Beginning - 2023
beginning.description: The idea started from a small group of developers who struggled to get quality education

beta.title: Beta Launch
beta.description: We launched a beta version with 100 students and 10 volunteer teachers

growth.title: Growth and Expansion
growth.description: We reached thousands of students in all governorates and doubled the number of teachers

future.title: The Future
future.description: We aspire to reach every Egyptian student and provide world-class education

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: A group of passionate young Egyptians making a real change in education

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly seek new and innovative ways to improve the learning experience

equality.title: Equality
equality.description: We believe in every student's right to excellent education regardless of their circumstances

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We ensure high-quality educational content that meets global standards

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: We work with passion and love to help students achieve their dreams

cta.title: Join Us in the Journey of Change
cta.description: Whether you're a student, teacher, or parent, you can be part of this journey
